name: Need for Speed Most Wanted Android OBB Size File

description: An OBB file is an expansion file used by some apps distributed using the Google Play store. They contain data not stored in the app's main package ( .APK file). Most Android mobile games store game assets, such as in-game images, models, and sounds, in an OBB file. Need for Speed Most Wanted uses its obb.size file to calculate and confirm the size of the game's current OBB file.
